title: About The Railway Men, on Netflix
selftext:
The show on OTT is garnering a lot of attention.

What's practically unknown is that some employees of that plant have been fighting the courts for justice.

[Their lawyer has put out a series of tweets where YRF deviates from facts](https://twitter.com/AnirbanFromRLF/status/1726606521696760017?t=5d-lRpBX3EnsJ4RhQ0QkSg&s=19)
